name: Mist of the Dark
description: Mist of the Dark challenges your ability to survive. Can you face your fears? Play as a monster and scare your friends. Play as the soldier and use tactics to hunt the monster(s) down. Scare the players. Stick with your team and discover objects and level advantages to take down the monster.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 750 2GB DDR3 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Laptops may require more RAM and a dedicated graphics card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 960 2GB DDR5 DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Laptops may require more RAM and a dedicated graphics card
